description: Works to tree in Montagu Cemeteries Conservation Area: 6x conifer (T1)- fell  to ground level and stump grind below ground 60cm, 3x conifers (T2)- fell to ground level, 1x conifer (T3)-fell to ground level and conifer hedge (T4)- cutback up to 2-3m in spread overhanging the gravestones.
